org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.common

  • 使用org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.common的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.protocolPB
    Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one or more contributor license agreements.
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.aliasmap  
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.blockmanagement  
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.common  
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.common.blockaliasmap
    The AliasMap defines mapping of PROVIDED HDFS blocks to data in remote storage systems.
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.common.blockaliasmap.impl

  • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.protocolPB使用的org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.common中的类 
    类和说明
    FileRegion
    This class is used to represent provided blocks that are file regions, i.e., can be described using (path, offset, length).
    HdfsServerConstants.NamenodeRole
    Defines the NameNode role.
    HdfsServerConstants.NodeType
    Type of the node
    HdfsServerConstants.ReplicaState
    Block replica states, which it can go through while being constructed.
  • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.aliasmap使用的org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.common中的类 
    类和说明
    FileRegion
    This class is used to represent provided blocks that are file regions, i.e., can be described using (path, offset, length).
  • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.blockmanagement使用的org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.common中的类 
    类和说明
    HdfsServerConstants.BlockUCState
    States, which a block can go through while it is under construction.
  • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.common使用的org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.common中的类 
    类和说明
    BlockAlias
    Interface used to load provided blocks.

    States, which a block can go through while it is under construction.

    Defines the NameNode role.

    Type of the node

    Block replica states, which it can go through while being constructed.
    HdfsServerConstants.RollingUpgradeStartupOption
    Startup options for rolling upgrade.

    Startup options
